attributes.action: eliminate the practice of charging  tax on taxes or duties, such as  Vat on petrol duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the British Government to desist on taxing British citizens on the government's own taxes or duties. The primary example of this is charging VAT on the government's portion of a product's sale price; for example the Vat charged on petrol, the price of which already includes an extrememly high % of government duties. The initials VAT stand for "Value Added Tax" and the duties charged by the government can in no way be considered as adding value.
